title: Atomic vector
_description: Vector of atomic values, stored in a (possibly compressed) text file in the [standard CSV format](https://github.com/ArtifactDB/comservatory).
If the vector is unnamed, the file should have a single column containing the vector elements.
If the vector is named, the fil should contain two columns;
the first (string) column contains the names of the vector elements and the second column contains the vector elements themselves.
In both cases, the headers are ignored.

Type of the column.

- Integers, (floating-point) numbers, strings and booleans are their usual selves.
- Dates are strings consisting of integers and dashes, following the `YYYY-MM-DD` format.
- Date-times are strings following RFC 3339 Section 5.6, i.e., the Internet Date/Time format.
